channel.title: CVE Feed for Oxygen Builder -- Oxygen Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oxygen Builder -- Oxygen Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-6688|2024-08-27T04:29:17.960Z -- oxygen%20builder -- oxygen%20builder
item.description: The Oxygen Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the oxy_save_css_from_admin AJAX action in all versions up to, and including, 4.8.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to update stylesheets.

item.title: CVE-2024-4662|2024-08-01T20:47:41.332Z -- oxygen%20builder -- oxygen%20builder
item.description: The Oxygen Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution in all versions up to, and including, 4.8.2 via post metadata. This is due to the plugin storing custom data in post metadata without an underscore prefix. This makes it possible for lower privileged users, such as contributors, to inject arbitrary PHP code via the WordPress user interface and gain elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-4662|2024-06-04T17:54:39.869Z -- oxygen%20builder -- oxygen%20builder
item.description: The Oxygen Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution in all versions up to, and including, 4.8.2 via post metadata. This is due to the plugin storing custom data in post metadata without an underscore prefix. This makes it possible for lower privileged users, such as contributors, to inject arbitrary PHP code via the WordPress user interface and gain elevated privileges.
